movement
Class BasicMovTest

java.lang.Object
  movement.BasicMovTest

public class BasicMovTest
extends java.lang.Object

Tests the basic movement and config parameters (wheel width/radius) Try different values using this test for WHEEL_RADIUS and WIDTH Can also use this as a base for odometry/correction The robot should be able to complete two laps with less than 3 cm difference from the origin and diverge less than 15 deg from the starting angle (without the odometery correction). With odo correction : robot should maintain less than 3 cm difference from origin and less than 15 deg divergence after 5 runs
